headline: How Dollar Tree’s New Oklahoma Distribution Center May Shape Supply Chain Resilience for DLTR Investors
summary: On September 24, 2025, Dollar Tree broke ground on a new one million sq. ft. distribution center in Marietta, Oklahoma, replacing a facility lost to a tornado in April 2024 and pledging US$50,000 in grants to local organizations. This project highlights Dollar Tree's commitment to restoring regional operations, supporting 700 stores and returning 400 jobs to the community. We'll explore how the major new distribution center investment may impact Dollar Tree’s supply chain resilience and...
